judgment_text:
IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE OF BOMBAY

ORDINARY ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION

OFFICIAL LIQUIDATOR S REPORT DATED 6TH MARCH, 2009

IN

COMPANY PETITION NO.141 OF 1989

OLR NO.94/08/LIQN.VIII

In the matter of the companies Act, I

of 1956.

And

In the matter of M/s. Hongkong

Investment Co.Pvt.Ltd.(in liqn.)

Mikin Bharat Mehta.

..Petitioner.

Mr.S.J.Shah i/b. M. Merchant for I. Advani.

Ms. Kalawati Advani present in person.

Mr.Bharat Vaishnawa for Ms.Kalawati Advani.

Mr.D.Bhalekar for Bilawala & Co.

Mr.P.Ramarao, O.L.

CORAM: A.M.KHANWILKAR,J

DATE : MAY 7, 2009.

P.C. :

.

Counsel for Bilawala and Co. points out that

the bills which are annexed to the present report are

already paid. According to her, bills which are

unpaid are not placed on record. The Official

Liquidator to submit further report.

.

Official Liquidator may also consider the

stand taken by the Counsel for the Kalawati Advani

that she is absolved from paying any further

professional fees to Bilawala and Company after July,

, having paid all the outstanding dues.

According to the Counsel for the Kalawati Advani,

services of Bilawala and Company have been continued

by the Official Liquidator after July, 2008, which

was unnecessary. That aspect may also be considered

by the Official Liquidator. Ordered accordingly.

(A.M.KHANWILKAR,J)
